info.name: Skill Foundation API - Complete Documentation
info.description: Complete API collection for Skill Foundation platform with full documentation. Includes authentication, user management, roadmap management, progress tracking, and AI generation features.

variable.description: Base URL for the API server
JWT authentication token (automatically set after login)

item.name: üîê Authentication
item.description: Endpoints for user authentication and registration

request.description:
Register a new user account.

**Required fields:**
- `username`: Unique username (min 3 characters)
- `email`: Valid email address (unique)
- `password`: Password (min 6 characters)

**Response:** Returns user object with JWT token

Login with email and password.

**Required fields:**
- `email`: User email address
- `password`: User password

**Response:** Returns JWT access token (automatically saved to collection variable)

**Note:** Token is automatically saved and used for subsequent requests

Request password reset email.

**Required fields:**
- `email`: User email address

**Response:** Sends password reset email to the user

Get list of all users in the system.

**Authentication:** Not required

**Response:** Returns array of user objects (without passwords)

Get user information by ID.

**Parameters:**
- `id`: User UUID

**Authentication:** Not required

**Response:** Returns user object

Get current authenticated user's profile.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Response:** Returns current user's profile information

Update current user's profile.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Optional fields:**
- `username`: New username
- `bio`: User biography
- `skills`: Array of skill strings
- `profilePicture`: URL to profile picture

**Response:** Returns updated user object

Delete current user's account.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Warning:** This will permanently delete:
- User account
- All user's roadmaps
- All roadmap items, tasks, resources, and documentation
- All progress data

**Response:** Success message

item.name: üó∫Ô∏è Roadmap Management
item.description: Endpoints for creating and managing learning roadmaps

request.description:
Create a new learning roadmap.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Required fields:**
- `title`: Roadmap title

**Optional fields:**
- `description`: Roadmap description

**Response:** Returns created roadmap object

**Note:** Progress tracking is automatically created for the roadmap

Get all roadmaps created by the current user.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Response:** Returns array of roadmap objects with their items

Get roadmap by ID with all related items, tasks, resources, and documentation.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `id`: Roadmap ID

**Response:** Returns roadmap object with:
- Items (roadmap sections)
- Tasks for each item
- Resources for each item
- Documentation for each item

Update roadmap information.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `id`: Roadmap ID

**Optional fields:**
- `title`: New roadmap title
- `description`: New roadmap description

**Response:** Returns updated roadmap object

Delete a roadmap and all its related data.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `id`: Roadmap ID

**Warning:** This will permanently delete:
- Roadmap
- All roadmap items
- All tasks, resources, and documentation
- Progress tracking data

**Response:** Success message

Create a complete roadmap with items, tasks, resources, and documentation in one request.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Required fields:**
- `title`: Roadmap title

**Optional fields:**
- `description`: Roadmap description
- `items`: Array of roadmap items, each containing:
  - `title`: Item title
  - `description`: Item description
  - `order`: Display order
  - `tasks`: Array of tasks
  - `resources`: Array of resources
  - `documentation`: Array of documentation

**Response:** Returns created roadmap with all items and related data

Create a new item (section) in a roadmap.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `roadmapId`: Roadmap ID

**Required fields:**
- `title`: Item title

**Optional fields:**
- `description`: Item description
- `order`: Display order (auto-assigned if not provided)

**Response:** Returns created roadmap item

Get all items (sections) in a roadmap.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `roadmapId`: Roadmap ID

**Response:** Returns array of roadmap items with their tasks, resources, and documentation, ordered by `order` field

Get a specific roadmap item by ID.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `id`: Roadmap item ID

**Response:** Returns roadmap item with all related tasks, resources, and documentation

Update a roadmap item.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `id`: Roadmap item ID

**Optional fields:**
- `title`: New item title
- `description`: New item description
- `order`: New display order

**Response:** Returns updated roadmap item

Delete a roadmap item and all its related data.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `id`: Roadmap item ID

**Warning:** This will permanently delete:
- Roadmap item
- All tasks in the item
- All resources in the item
- All documentation in the item

**Response:** Success message

item.name: ‚úÖ Task Management
item.description: Endpoints for managing tasks and marking them as completed

request.description:
Mark a task as completed.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `id`: Task ID

**Response:** Success message

**Note:** Progress tracking is automatically updated when a task is marked as completed

Mark a task as incomplete (unmark as completed).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `id`: Task ID

**Response:** Success message

**Note:** Progress tracking is automatically updated when a task is marked as incomplete

item.name: üìö Resource Management
item.description: Endpoints for managing resources and marking them as completed

request.description:
Mark a resource as completed.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `id`: Resource ID

**Response:** Success message

**Note:** Progress tracking is automatically updated when a resource is marked as completed

Mark a resource as incomplete (unmark as completed).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `id`: Resource ID

**Response:** Success message

**Note:** Progress tracking is automatically updated when a resource is marked as incomplete

item.name: üìñ Documentation Management
item.description: Endpoints for managing documentation and marking it as completed

request.description:
Mark documentation as completed.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `id`: Documentation ID

**Response:** Success message

**Note:** Progress tracking is automatically updated when documentation is marked as completed

Mark documentation as incomplete (unmark as completed).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `id`: Documentation ID

**Response:** Success message

**Note:** Progress tracking is automatically updated when documentation is marked as incomplete

item.name: üìä Progress Tracking
item.description: Endpoints for tracking learning progress on roadmaps

request.description:
Get detailed progress information for a roadmap.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Parameters:**
- `roadmapId`: Roadmap ID

**Response:** Returns progress object with:
- `totalPercentage`: Overall completion percentage
- `totalTasks`: Total number of tasks
- `totalResources`: Total number of resources
- `totalDocumentation`: Total number of documentation items
- `tasksCompleted`: Number of completed tasks
- `resourcesCompleted`: Number of completed resources
- `documentationCompleted`: Number of completed documentation items
- `tasksProgressPercentage`: Percentage of tasks completed
- `resourcesProgressPercentage`: Percentage of resources completed
- `documentationProgressPercentage`: Percentage of documentation completed
- `roadmapItemsProgress`: Array of progress for each roadmap item

**Note:** Progress is automatically recalculated on each request based on current task/resource/documentation completion status

Generate a complete learning roadmap using AI.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Required fields:**
- `topic`: Topic or skill to learn (e.g., "React Development", "Python Programming")

**Response:** Returns generated roadmap with:
- Title and description
- Multiple roadmap items (sections)
- Tasks for each item
- Resources for each item
- Documentation for each item

**Note:** The generated roadmap is automatically saved and associated with your account

exec: // Auto-add Authorization header if token exists
